component.name: Astroid
component.summary: A graphical threads-with-tags style, lightweight and fast, e-mail client for Notmuch

description.p: Astroid is a lightweight and fast Mail User Agent that provides a graphical interface to searching, display and composing email, organized in thread and tags. Astroid uses the notmuch backend for blazingly fast searches through tons of email.
